projects.title: NeoVim Config
projects.description: A neovim configuration that I use for my development. It is built using Lua and Lazy.

projects.title: Alki
projects.description: Alki is a platform that uses spaced repetition to helps students and engineers study data-structures and algorithms. It provides a variety of resources and tools to help students study effectively.

projects.title: PortfolioSite
projects.description: A portfolio site to showcase my projects and skills. It is built using React and tailwindcss.
